Trigger.name: Health
Trigger.script:
for _,i in pairs({1,2,3}) do if selectString("Healthy", i) > -1 then fg("ForestGreen") end end
for _,i in pairs({1,2,3}) do if selectString("Fine", i) > -1 then fg("DarkGreen") end end
for _,i in pairs({1,2,3}) do if selectString("Hurt", i) > -1 then fg("DarkGoldenrod") end end
for _,i in pairs({1,2,3}) do if selectString("Wounded", i) > -1 then fg("black") bg("DarkGoldenrod") end end
for _,i in pairs({1,2,3}) do if selectString("Bad", i) > -1 then fg("DarkSlateBlue") bg("DarkGoldenrod") end end
for _,i in pairs({1,2,3}) do if selectString("Awful", i) > -1 then fg("black") bg("ansi_red") end end
for _,i in pairs({1,2,3}) do if selectString("Dying", i) > -1 then fg("slate_gray") bg("ansi_red") end end
if selectString("Exhausted", 1) > -1 then fg("chocolate") end
if selectString("Fainting", 1) > -1 then fg("DarkSalmon") end
if selectString("Weak", 1) > -1 then fg("burlywood") end
if selectString("Slow", 1) > -1 then fg("PeachPuff") end
if selectString("Tired", 1) > -1 then fg("AntiqueWhite") end
if selectString("Burning", 1) > -1 then fg("LavenderBlush") end
if selectString("Hot", 1) > -1 then fg("thistle") end
if selectString("Warm", 1) > -1 then fg("plum") end
if selectString("Cold", 1) > -1 then fg("LightSlateBlue") end
if selectString("Icy", 1) > -1 then fg("SlateBlue") end
if selectString("Frozen", 1) > -1 then fg("DarkSlateBlue") end cecho("<reset>")

local curHP = tonumber(matches[2], 10) local maxHP = tonumber(matches[3], 10)

Trigger.name: night vision : Your night vision is refreshed.
night vision : Your vision blurs.
Trigger.script:
local night_vision = spell_timer.get_timer("night_vision")
night_vision.stop_time = time.get_time() night_vision.last_elapsed_time = night_vision.elapsed_time night_vision.elapsed_time = night_vision.stop_time - night_vision.start_time
local time = time.convert_seconds_to_hms(night_vision.elapsed_time) echo("\nThe spell lasted " .. time .. ".\n")

Trigger.name: night vision : - night vision
Trigger.script:
local night_vision = spell_timer.get_timer("night_vision")
if night_vision.start_time == 0 then night_vision.start_time = time.get_time() end
night_vision.elapsed_time = time.get_time() - night_vision.start_time
local time_str = time.convert_seconds_to_hms(night_vision.elapsed_time)
local append = "" if night_vision.last_elapsed_time == nil then night_vision.last_elapsed_time = 0 end if night_vision.last_elapsed_time ~= 0 then local percent = math.floor(night_vision.elapsed_time / night_vision.last_elapsed_time * 100) local time_to_go = time.convert_seconds_to_hms(night_vision.last_elapsed_time - night_vision.elapsed_time) append = "<grey>/<" .. spell_timer.colour .. ">" .. time_to_go .. "<grey>/<" .. spell_timer.colour .. ">" .. percent .. "%<grey>" end
selectString(matches[1], 1) replace("") cinsertText(matches[1] .. " (<" .. spell_timer.colour .. ">" .. time_str .. append .. "<grey>)")

AliasGroup.name: config
AliasGroup.script:
local configExclusionKeys = { "configRows", "quickAliases" }
local args = matches[3] or ""
if not args or args == "" then
local rows = "" table.foreach(MUME.configRows, function(idx) local row = MUME.configRows[idx] rows = rows .. "\n" .. string.rpad(row, 15, " ") .. ": " .. MUME[row] end)
configStr = string.format([[ %s ]], rows)
echo(configStr)
else local cmds = string.split(args, " ") if cmds[1] == "set" then local what = cmds[2] local value = cmds[3] if what and value then if table.contains(MUME, what) then MUME[what] = value echo(string.format(" [ %s: '%s']\n", what, value)) else echo(string.format(" Unknown config variable '%s'!", what)) end else echo(" config set <variable> <value>\n") end else if cmds[1] == "rows" then local rows = table.slice(cmds, 2, 10) local rowsToBeInserted = {} table.foreach(rows, function(idx) local row = rows[idx] if table.contains(table.keys(MUME), row) and not table.contains(configExclusionList, row) then table.insert(rowsToBeInserted, row) end end) if #rowsToBeInserted == 0 then print(" config rows <row1> <row2> ...") else MUME.configRows = rowsToBeInserted print(" Updated config rows.") end end end end

Alias.name: init
Alias.script:
local settings = { ["amund"] = [[ config set weapon1 elven config set weapon2 embellished config set light ruby config set herbcontainer web config rows target mount weapon1 weapon2 light herbcontainer ]], ["sumac"] = [[ config set weapon1 engraved config set weapon2 embellished ssn spbl config set herbcontainer pack config rows target mount spell speed weapon1 weapon2 herbcontainer ]], ["shargaas"] = [[ config set weapon1 warhammer config set weapon2 broadsword config set herbcontainer pack config rows target mount weapon1 weapon2 herbcontainer ]], ["zlad"] = [[ config set weapon1 dunadan config set weapon2 engraved ssn splb config set herbcontainer pack config rows target mount spell speed weapon1 weapon2 herbcontainer ]], ["morne"] = [[ config set weapon1 mighty config set weapon2 broadsword config set herbcontainer pack config rows target mount weapon1 weapon2 herbcontainer ]], ["zazzmatazz"] = [[ config set weapon1 barbed config set weapon2 longbow config set herbcontainer pack config rows target mount weapon1 weapon2 herbcontainer ]], ["uinrar"] = [[ config set weapon1 dagger config set weapon2 yew ssn splb config set herbcontainer pack config rows target mount spell speed weapon1 weapon2 herbcontainer ]], }
local name = string.lower(matches[3]) if name == "list" then echo(" Known characters:") for name, _ in pairs(settings) do echo("\n - " .. name) end echo("\n") return end
if not settings[name] then print(" Unknown character: " .. name .. "!") return end
print(" Loading settings for " .. name .. ".")
local rows = settings[name]:split("\n")
for _, row in pairs(rows) do local i = string.trim(row) if not (i == "") then expandAlias(i, false) end end

Alias.name: mix
Alias.script:
local lore = matches[2] if lore == "kit" then send("mix kit", false) return end local ingredients = { ["travelling"] = [[ tarragon clover ginseng ]], ["walking"] = [[ clover juniper marjoram cloves ]], ["antidote"] = [[ blackberries blackberries lily figwort athelas ]], ["clearthought"] = [[ juniper mauve sage thyme ]], ["soothing-draught"] = [[ honey sage thyme blackcurrant lily ]], ["baker"] = [[ honey egg egg egg flour ]], ["draught"] = [[ tail fur tarragon blood ]], ["healing"] = [[ sage sage athelas foxtail blackcurrant ]] }
if lore == "list" then echo(" Known recipes:") for lore, _ in pairs(ingredients) do echo("\n - " .. lore) end echo("\n") return end
if not ingredients[lore] then print(" Unknown recipe: '" .. lore .. "'!") return end
local now = matches[3] local times = matches[5] or "1" local n_times = tonumber(times)
local container = MUME.herbcontainer or MUME.container or "backpack"
for i = 1, n_times, 1 do local items = ingredients[lore] :split("\n")
for _, item in pairs(items) do local i = string.trim(item) if not (i == "") then send(string.format("get %s %s", i, container)) send(string.format("put %s kit", i)) end end
if now then send("mix kit") end end

Script.name: utils
Script.script:
--- Pads str to length len with char from right string.lpad = function(str, len, char) if char == nil then char = ' ' end return str .. string.rep(char, len - #str) end
--- Pads str to length len with char from left string.rpad = function(str, len, char) if char == nil then char = ' ' end return string.rep(char, len - #str) .. str end
function switch(t) t.case = function (self,x) local f=self[x] or self.default if f then if type(f)=="function" then f(x,self) else error("case "..tostring(x).." not a function") end end end return t end
function table.slice(tbl, first, last, step) local sliced = {}
for i = first or 1, last or #tbl, step or 1 do sliced[#sliced+1] = tbl[i] end
return sliced end
function UserWindowWrap(name) uwFontSize = getFontSize(name) uwWidth, uwHeight = getUserWindowSize(name) uwPixelSize = uwFontSize + 5.5 uwPixelWrap = uwWidth / uwPixelSize setWindowWrap(name, uwPixelWrap) end
function keysub(name) cecho("<SlateGrey> ("..name..")<reset>") end
function table.removeKey(t, k) local i = 0 local keys, values = {},{} for k,v in pairs(t) do i = i + 1 keys[i] = k values[i] = v end
while i>0 do if keys[i] == k then table.remove(keys, i) table.remove(values, i) break end i = i - 1 end
local a = {} for i = 1,#keys do a[keys[i]] = values[i] end
return a end
function replace_char(pos, str, r) return str:sub(1, pos-1) .. r .. str:sub(pos+1) end
function printTable(table) print("{") for i, v in ipairs(table) do print(" " .. i .. " = '" .. v .. "'") end print("}") end

Script.name: deleteOldProfiles script
Script.script:
function deleteOldProfiles(keepdays_arg, delete_maps)
--[[ Deletes old profiles/maps in the "current"/"map" folders of the Mudlet home directory. The following files are NOT deleted: - Files newer than the amount of days specified as an argument to deleteOldProfiles(), or 31 days if not specified. - One file for every month before that. Specifically: The first available file of every month prior to this. Setting the second argument to true will delete maps instead of profiles. (e.g. deleteOldProfiles(10, true)) --]]
local keepdays = tonumber(keepdays_arg) or 31 local profile_table = {} local used_last_mod_months = {} local slash = (string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/") and "/" or "\\" local dirpath = getMudletHomeDir()..slash..(delete_maps and "map" or "current") local delnum = 0
-- Traverse the profiles folder and create a table of files: for filename in lfs.dir(dirpath) do if filename~="." and filename~=".." then profile_table[#profile_table+1] = {name = filename, last_mod = lfs.attributes(dirpath..slash..filename, "modification")} end end
-- Sort the table according to last modification date from old to new: table.sort(profile_table, function (a,b) return a.last_mod < b.last_mod end)
echo(string.format("\nDeleting old %s. Files newer than %d days and one profile for every month before that will be kept.", delete_maps and "maps" or "profiles", keepdays)) for i,v in ipairs(profile_table) do local days = math.floor(os.difftime(os.time(), v.last_mod)/86400) local last_mod_month = os.date("%Y/%m", v.last_mod) if days > keepdays then -- For profiles older than X days, check if we already kept a table for this month: if not table.contains(used_last_mod_months, last_mod_month) then -- If not, do nothing and mark this month as "kept". used_last_mod_months[#used_last_mod_months+1] = last_mod_month else -- Otherwise remove the file: local success, errorstring = os.remove(dirpath..slash..v.name) if success then delnum = delnum + 1 else cecho("\n<red>ERROR: "..errorstring) end end end end echo(string.format("\nDeletion complete. %d/%d files were removed successfully.", delnum, #profile_table)) end

Script.name: sysSendAllProfiles
score gauges
Script.script:
local lastHP local lastMove local lastMana
function updateScoreGauges(hp, mana, moves) if hp then updateGauge('HP', getHPPct(hp)) end if mana then updateGauge('moves', getMovesPct(moves)) end if moves then updateGauge('mana', getManaPct(mana)) end end
local hpLevels = { ["Healthy"] = "100%", ["Fine"] = "71%", ["Hurt"] = "46%", ["Wounded"] = "26%", ["Bad"] = "11%", ["Awful"] = "1%", ["Dying"] = "0%", }
local manaLevels = { ["Full"] = "100%", ["Burning"] = "70%", ["Hot"] = "45%", ["Warm"] = "25%", ["Cold"] = "10%", ["Frozen"] = "1%", ["Icy"] = "0%", }
local moveLevels = { ["Exhausted"] = "0%", ["Fainting"] = "1%", ["Weak"] = "4%", ["Slow"] = "11%", ["Tired"] = "22%", ["Full"] = "100%", }
function getHPPct(hp) if hpLevels[hp] then return hpLevels[hp] else return hp end end
function getManaPct(mana) if manaLevels[mana] then return manaLevels[mana] else return mana end end
function getMovesPct(moves) if moveLevels[moves] then return moveLevels[moves] else return moves end end
local hpbar local manabar local movebar
function setupGauges() setupHPGauge() setupManaGauge() setupMoveGauge() end
function setupHPGauge() if hpbar then return end hpbar = Geyser.Gauge:new({ name="hp", x="85%", y="2%", width="15%", height="2%",}) hpbar:setValue(0) end
function setupMoveGauge() if movebar then return end movebar = Geyser.Gauge:new({ name="move", x="85%", y="5%", width="15%", height="2%",}) movebar:setValue(0) end
function setupManaGauge() if manabar then return end manabar = Geyser.Gauge:new({ name="mana", x="85%", y="8%", width="15%", height="2%",}) hpbar:setValue(0) end
setupGauges()
function updateGauge(type, value) if not value then return end local val = tonumber(value:gsub("%%", ""), 10) --print(string.format("%s %s", type, val)) if type == "HP" then hpbar:setValue(val) end if type == "moves" then movebar:setValue(val) end if type == "mana" then manabar:setValue(val) end end

ScriptGroup.name: Spell Timer

Script.name: README
Script.script:
spell_timer.help = [[ Spell Timer Author: Octavia Thanks: - nstockton for most of the spell messages - p(Cahal) for testing Version: 1.0 Changelog: - 1.0, 2015-2-11 - Initial release.
This package tracks the duration of various status effects from spells. When you use stat, the package will display for each spell effect, the time since the spell was cast or refreshed. If the spell ends, that time is remembered and stat will then show the time remaining and percent complete of the spell if it is cast again.
The commands are as follows: - spell timer help : Show this message. - spell timer make triggers : Recreates the triggers under Spell Timer. This should not be necessary to use.
Dependencies (included): - Time ]]

Script.name: spells
make_triggers
Script.script:
function spell_timer.make_triggers() local code
-- For each spell for name, spell in pairs(spell_timer.spells) do -- Create the trigger to start timer code = spell_timer.get_trigger_start_code(spell) spell_timer.make_trigger(name, spell.start, code)
-- Create the trigger to refresh timer if spell.refresh ~= "" then code = spell_timer.get_trigger_start_code(spell) spell_timer.make_trigger(name, spell.refresh, code) end
-- Create the trigger to stop timer code = spell_timer.get_trigger_stop_code(spell) spell_timer.make_trigger(name, spell.stop, code)
-- Create the trigger to show timer (status) code = spell_timer.get_trigger_show_code(spell) local show = "- " .. name spell_timer.make_trigger(name, show, code) end end

Script.name: make_trigger
Script.script:
function spell_timer.make_trigger(name, text, code) local name = name .. " : " .. text local parent = spell_timer.group local regex = "^" .. text .. "$"
if exists(name, "trigger") == 0 then permRegexTrigger(name, parent, { regex }, code) else echo("Spell Timer: Error: Already exists: " .. name .. ".\n") end end

Script.name: get_trigger_start_code
Script.script:
function spell_timer.get_trigger_start_code(spell) local code = [[ local <NAME> = spell_timer.get_timer("<NAME>")
<NAME>.start_time = time.get_time() ]] code = string.gsub(code, "<NAME>", spell.name) return code end

Script.name: get_trigger_stop_code
get_trigger_show_code
Script.script:
function spell_timer.get_trigger_show_code(spell) local code = [[ local <NAME> = spell_timer.get_timer("<NAME>")
if <NAME>.start_time == 0 then <NAME>.start_time = time.get_time() end
<NAME>.elapsed_time = time.get_time() - <NAME>.start_time
local time_str = time.convert_seconds_to_hms(<NAME>.elapsed_time)
local append = "" if <NAME>.last_elapsed_time == nil then <NAME>.last_elapsed_time = 0 end if <NAME>.last_elapsed_time ~= 0 then local percent = math.floor(<NAME>.elapsed_time / <NAME>.last_elapsed_time * 100) local time_to_go = time.convert_seconds_to_hms(<NAME>.last_elapsed_time - <NAME>.elapsed_time) append = "<grey>/<" .. spell_timer.colour .. ">" .. time_to_go .. "<grey>/<" .. spell_timer.colour .. ">" .. percent .. "%<grey>" end
selectString(matches[1], 1) replace("") cinsertText(matches[1] .. " (<" .. spell_timer.colour .. ">" .. time_str .. append .. "<grey>)") ]] code = string.gsub(code, "<NAME>", spell.name) return code end

Script.name: get_timer
Script.script:
function spell_timer.get_timer(name) if not spell_timer.timers[name] then local timer = {} timer.start_time = 0 timer.stop_time = 0 timer.elapsed_time = 0 timer.last_elapsed_time = 0
spell_timer.timers[name] = timer end
return spell_timer.timers[name] end

Script.name: truncate
get_time
convert_seconds_to_hms
Script.script:
function time.convert_seconds_to_hms(time_as_seconds) -- Hours part local hours = math.floor(time_as_seconds / 3600)
-- Minutes part local time_wo_hours = time_as_seconds - hours * 3600 local minutes = math.floor(time_wo_hours / 60)
-- Seconds part local seconds = time_wo_hours - minutes * 60
-- Buid result local result = ""
if hours ~= 0 then result = result .. hours .. "h" end
if minutes ~= 0 then result = result .. minutes .. "m" end
if seconds ~= 0 then result = result .. seconds .. "s" end
if result == "" then result = "now" end
return result end
